response_schema.current_price: string - Current MSFT stock price, e.g. '$420.50'
response_schema.price_change: string - Price change amount and percentage, e.g. '+$3.20 (+0.77%)'
response_schema.bullet_points: array of strings - 2-3 concise bullet point analysis sentences
response_schema.timestamp: string - ISO timestamp of when analysis was generated
